title: Tin Foil Hat #44: Jonbenet Ramsey with Andy Andrist and John Tole
description:
Welcome to another episode of Tin Foil Hat With Sam Tripoli. We just want to warn you up front that this episode is about Jonbenet Ramsey and it gets really dark, probably one of our darkest episodes we have ever done. This is a comedy podcast but this subject brought us into some very dark waters. If you do listen thank you very much.
One this episode Ryan and Sam welcome hilarious comedian Andy Andrist and podcast favorite John Tole! On this episode we discuss..
1) The huge Oct 10th Tin Foil Hat festival of friendship at the Ice House in Pasadena. In the main room we have the Tin Foil Hat Stand up comedy with Eddie Bravo, Jimmy Dore, Gareth Reynolds and Brendon Walsh. In the other room Tin Foil Hat is doing a swap cast with the amazing Greg Carlwood from the Higherside Chats! Tickets for both shows are available at Icehousecomedy.com!
2) We discuss December 25 and 26, 1996
3) The Ransom Note
4) The Parents
5) The Brother
6) Creepy Santa
7) Andy gives his verdict
8) The Madeleine McCann Case
9) Pamela Anderson's Vagina
Thank you for listening. Huge thank you to DJ Buddy for all the work he did on this episode. Without him this episode wouldn't have happened! We very much appreciate the support. You can find the show all over your favorite social media like
Twitter: @TinFolHatCast
Instagram: @TinFoilHatpod
Reddit: Reddit.com/TinFoilHatshow
Want to support the show?
You can buy your "Tin Foil Hat" t-shirts at AllComedyTshirts.com
You can donate to our PayPal at tinfoilhatpod@gmail.com!
Thank you so much for all of your love and support!
